targets.expr: 1 - (sum by(instance) (irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{server_type=~"$server_type",instance=~"$instance",job="$job", mode="idle"}[$__rate_interval])) / on(instance) group_left sum by (instance)((irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{server_type=~"$server_type",instance=~"$instance",job="$job"}[$__rate_interval]))))

sum by(instance) (irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{server_type=~"$server_type",instance=~"$instance",job="$job", mode="system"}[$__rate_interval])) / on(instance) group_left sum by (instance)((irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{server_type=~"$server_type",instance=~"$instance",job="$job"}[$__rate_interval])))

sum by(instance) (irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{server_type=~"$server_type",instance=~"$instance",job="$job", mode="user"}[$__rate_interval])) / on(instance) group_left sum by (instance)((irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{server_type=~"$server_type",instance=~"$instance",job="$job"}[$__rate_interval])))

sum by(instance) (irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{server_type=~"$server_type",instance=~"$instance",job="$job", mode="iowait"}[$__rate_interval])) / on(instance) group_left sum by (instance)((irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{server_type=~"$server_type",instance=~"$instance",job="$job"}[$__rate_interval])))

sum by(instance) (irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{server_type=~"$server_type",instance=~"$instance",job="$job", mode=~".*irq"}[$__rate_interval])) / on(instance) group_left sum by (instance)((irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{server_type=~"$server_type",instance=~"$instance",job="$job"}[$__rate_interval])))

sum by(instance) (irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{server_type=~"$server_type",instance=~"$instance",job="$job", mode="steal"}[$__rate_interval])) / on(instance) group_left sum by (instance)((irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{server_type=~"$server_type",instance=~"$instance",job="$job"}[$__rate_interval])))
